Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Plot: Susan and Bruce Miller move their family to a wealthy Chicago community as America celebrates its bicentennial. As neighbors welcome them to the neighborhood, the Millers soon discover that there is a sexual revolution going on and the question is, do they join in or keep to themselves.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Steve Shearer, Damon Carney, Nicole Swahn, Jason Singer, Angie Bolling, Morgan Farris

Episodes.Title: Love Will Find a Way
Episodes.Plot: Bruce's great day is capped off by going to a party with his wife Susan and the Deckers at the Playboy Club. Janet begins to understand how great her friendship with Susan is as she tries to get to know her new neighbors.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Mary Strong, Andrea Carina Pearson, Kelsey Crane, Robert Curtis Brown, Michael Patrick McGill, Robert Bagnell, John Getz, Muna Otaru, Mandy Levin

Episodes.Title: Double Exposure
Episodes.Plot: Susan and Bruce plan their housewarming party and Susan asks Janet for help in the hopes of fixing their friendship. Unfortunately, Trina has some very different ideas for the party including a fondue setup and a very big guest list.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: James Thomas, Alexandra Leighton, Daniel Graves, Justen Balay

Episodes.Title: Cabin Fever
Episodes.Plot: When the Thompsons have a change of heart about going to the Millers' cabin, Susan asks the Deckers to join them. The weekend gets off to good start but then the Thompsons decide to surprise them by showing up anyway.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use

Episodes.Title: Go Your Own Way
Episodes.Plot: Susan goes against Bruce's wishes when she decides to go to the fundraiser at the Deckers to help raise money for the star of the controversial film who is having legal trouble.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use

Episodes.Title: Friends with Benefits
Episodes.Plot: Susan's plans to help her husband's career backfire at the Ladies Auxiliary luncheon, but Janet is the one who makes a lasting impression. Trina runs into her old high school sweetheart at the luncheon making Tom wonder if there is more going on than just going down memory lane.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Heidi Marnhout, Judith Hoag, Ryan McPartlin, Rachelle LeFevre, Jim O'Heir

Episodes.Title: Heatwave
Episodes.Plot: Tom decides to throw a last minute pool party during a heatwave without consulting Trina first, who is still mad at her husband for his recent affair. Susan lends an ear when Roger loses his job and Bruce gets closer to his co-worker, Melinda.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Katie Lowes, Heidi Marnhout, Tony Daly, Elizabeth Ruscio

Episodes.Title: Puzzlerama
Episodes.Plot: Trina throws her annual "Puzzlerama" party where the clues for the game are the neighborhoods darkest secrets.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use

Episodes.Title: Swingus Interruptus
Episodes.Plot: Tom and Trina try a closed relationship just as Susan and Bruce open their's to Brad and Sylvia. Unfortunately, the foursome is interrupted by Laurie and Doug Stephens.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use

Episodes.Title: Running on Empty
Episodes.Plot: Bruce plans a family trip to the cabin but Laurie has other ideas about keeping her plans with Doug. Roger and Janet start seeing a therapist.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Latarsha Rose, Rylan Williams, Pat Crawford Brown, Romy Rosemont

Episodes.Title: Get Down Tonight
Episodes.Plot: Bruce and Susan enjoy a night of line dancing with Tom and Trina and Janet starts a temp job with a local newspaper.

Episodes.Title: Surprise
Episodes.Plot: A surprise party for Janet sparks shocking revelations between the neighbors.

Episodes.Title: Take It To The Limit
Episodes.Plot: During Trina and Tom's annual end of the summer clambake and key party, the neighborhood couples confront relationship-changing decisions.
